entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow except periods of snow inland overnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
